ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Air
ygData.msgSnippet: The same item dropped on Tarew Marr last night. Lemme confirm a few things with ya if you would. It drops on the third (gorgon) island off a harpie type thing.
ygData.messageBody:
The same item dropped on Tarew Marr last night. Lemme confirm a few things with ya if you would. It drops
on the third (gorgon) island off a harpie type thing. Or if not a harpie a Gorgalask since they look the
same. FoH reported a Pal-only belt with the same sort of stats so I'm assuming they drop for all melee
classes randomly on a specific mob perhaps.

Shada, each class gets 6 quest items, and supposedly there's tons of other stuff that drops as normal
loot. On Tarew Marr we obtained only 2 "dropped" items which includes the bard haste belt last night
however, so we'll see.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr

Andy Simpson wrote:

> Here are the numbers on the first bard armor I've seen from Plane of Air.
>
> Belt (don't remember name)
>
> 6 AC 6 CHA 5 STR HASTE +5 Sv Poison
>
> I'll have to check my screenshots to find out the mob that drops it.
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker
> Level 50 Bard of Qeynos
> Solusek Ro
